Service is inactive. please enable \"Notifications Widget\" service on Accessibility Settings, touch alert icon to open Accessibility Settings
When Accessibility Settings opens, select \"Notifications Widget\" and switch it from \"Off\" to \"On\". Touch \"OK\" in the warning dialog

After locking the screen, swipe the screen right and touch the + icon, choose \"Notifications Widget\" from the widget list, when the widget appears, swipe down to extend it, then touch it for few seconds and drag it to the right to replace the main clock widget
That\'s all. if you have any questions or issues - don\'t hesitate to contact us at admin@roymam.com
